summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3712 , for the improvement of 5th Avenue, from Virginia Street to Bell Street; by paving a strip eighteen (18) feet in width; under Ordinance No. 45642 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
